name: Under the Hood (Jan Marcano)
description:
Prepare to ignite as you rumble through the inside of an engine!

Play as Paul the gasoline drop and absorb other drops to get big enough and power up the engine!

Touching a smaller drop will add it your size, try and get to the target size before time runs out.

Fire consumes you, giving you a speed bost; while water dilutes you and makes you slower.

Move using WASD.

Made with the theme "Beneath the Surface" for Ludum Dare 29.

Progamming: 

-Felix Izarra (@FelixIzarra)

-Felix Vegas (@Felix_Vegas_)

Audio: Jan Marcano (@AldianSolkai)

Art: Marcos Vieira
